thread.title: Colts' Luck out with shoulder injury
thread.title_full: Colts' Luck out with shoulder injury

author: The Associated Press
title: Colts' Luck out with shoulder injury
text:
AJ Mast Colts' Luck out with shoulder injury 
FILE - In a Monday, Sept. 21, 2015 file photo, Indianapolis Colts quarterback Andrew Luck (12) throws against the New York Jets in the first half of an NFL football game in Indianapolis. Luck is inactive on Sunday, Oct. 4, 2015, and will miss his first NFL game because of a right shoulder injury. (AP Photo/AJ Mast, File) Michael Conroy Colts' Luck out with shoulder injury 
Indianapolis Colts' Andrew Luck runs before the start of an NFL football game between the Indianapolis Colts and the Jacksonville Jaguars, Sunday, Oct. 4, 2015, in Indianapolis. Luck is inactive Sunday and will miss his first NFL game because of a right shoulder injury. (AP Photo/Michael Conroy) Michael Conroy Indy trying to get kinks fixed after 16-13 OT win over Jags 
Indianapolis Colts' Andrew Luck, right,, runs before the start of an NFL football game between the Indianapolis Colts and the Jacksonville Jaguars, Sunday, Oct. 4, 2015, in Indianapolis. Luck is inactive Sunday and will miss his first NFL game because of a right shoulder injury. Matt Hasselbeck, left, will start in place of Luck. (AP Photo/Michael Conroy) Posted: Sunday, October 4, 2015 4:30 pm | Updated: 8:01 pm, Sun Oct 4, 2015. 
Colts quarterback Andrew Luck will miss his first NFL game on Sunday against Jacksonville with a right shoulder injury. 
He had started the first 57 games of his career, including the playoffs. Subscription Required An online service is needed to view this article in its entirety.
